item.title: About Ingo Richter (me)
item.description: I’m a software engineer with a vast experience in developing and shipping software with a strong focus on customer demands, usability, and quality. I’m working with agile teams to deliver exceptionally high-quality software that adds value to the customer. I’m a certified Scrum Master with nearly eight years of experience in practicing it. I have a background in software development, and I’m involved in creating commercial software and open source for over 20 years.
